Everything you need to
captivate your audience

Built for reliability, designed for engagement. Lumina provides all the tools you need to manage screens at scale.

Remote Management

Control screens in Tokyo, New York, and London from a single dashboard. Real-time status updates and screenshots.

Drag & Drop Builder

Create stunning layouts without coding. Use our visual editor to arrange images, videos, and dynamic widgets.

Offline Support

Never go dark. Content is cached locally on the player, ensuring playback continues even if the internet drops.

Smart Analytics

Know what's playing and when. Track impressions and playback duration to optimize your content strategy.

Live Data Feeds

Connect to RSS, Social Media, Weather, and News APIs to keep your content fresh and relevant automatically.

Enterprise Security

Role-based access control, SSO, and audit logs. Built for teams that demand security and compliance.

Simple, transparent pricing

Start for free, scale as you grow.
